channel.title: Vestibule :: Suggestions for "Let's hear it for Adhearsion"
channel.description: A list of all suggestions made for "Let's hear it for Adhearsion"

item.title: Suggestion from Stephan (@)
item.description: It's a cool piece of software, but (as a regular Euruko attendee & occasional speaker) I have to agree with Javier: Two times is probably enough. (A lighting talk or live example would be nice though.)

item.title: Suggestion from Javier Ram√≠rez (@javier)
item.description: Having attended to two eurukos talk about adhearsion (2009 and 2011) I can't really say I am keen on listening to yet another talk about the product. It's quite cool, but the quota has been exceeded IMHO

item.title: Suggestion from Panayotis Matsinopoulos (@pmatsinopoulos)
item.description: I absolutely want to attend this presentation, because I was one of them afraid it were too difficult to build such an application. Many pluses and looking forward to it. I believe it will save me a lot of time.
